actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the President should oppose the imposition of duties on United States soybeans and soybean products imported into countries of the European Community.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should: (1) continue to oppose the proposed modification of the Common Agricultural Policy of the Commission of the European Community to impose duties on soybeans and soybean products imported into countries of the Community; (2) take measures to protect U.S. trading interests if such modification is adopted; and (3) urge the Council of European Community Ministers to reject any proposal that would put a financial burden on U.S. agricultural producers.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the President should oppose the imposition of duties on United States soybeans and soybean products imported into countries of the European Community.
